publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3180 Stewart Stevenson: The Draft Town and Country Planning (Grounds for Declining to Follow Recommendations) (Scotland) Regulations 2009—That the Local Government and Communities Committee recommends that the draft Town and Country Planning (Grounds for Declining to Follow Recommendations) (Scotland) Regulations 2009 be approved. Supported by: John Swinney*

S3M-3180 Stewart Stevenson: The Draft Town and Country Planning (Grounds for Declining to Follow Recommendations) (Scotland) Regulations 2009—That the Local Government and Communities Committee recommends that the draft Town and Country Planning (Grounds for Declining to Follow Recommendations) (Scotland) Regulations 2009 be approved. Supported by: John Swinney
